attributes.additional_details:
Hate preacher Anjem Choudary has been radicalising extremists for years. He is a prolific preacher against western life, British culture and calls on people to commit violence by global jihad and behead the non believers. He was a key figure in radicalising the Woolwich attacker Michael Adebolajo, and also in radicalising others involved in acts of violence, hate preaching and terrorism such as Richard Dart who was arrested for his involvement in a terror plot.

Hate preaching is supposedly illegal, so what more does he have to do to get arrested?

rejection.details: This is an operational policing matter for the relevant polcie force.
